                               NORTH DAKOTA

                       STATE INDUSTRIAL COMMISSION

                                  MAY 2013

                      OIL AND GAS PRODUCTION REPORT

FIGURES SHOULD BE PROMPTLY CHECKED UPON RECEIPT OF THIS SCHEDULE.  ANY
ERRORS SHOULD BE REPORTED TO THE NORTH DAKOTA INDUSTRIAL COMMISSION, OIL
& GAS DIVISION IMMEDIATELY. ADDRESS CORRESPONDENCE TO THE NORTH DAKOTA
INDUSTRIAL COMMISSION, OIL & GAS DIVISION, 600 EAST BOULEVARD, BISMARCK,
NORTH DAKOTA 58505.
